forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Areas of fog early, becoming sunny this afternoon. High 16C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Foggy early, becoming sunny this afternoon. High 59F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low around 45F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 61F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 9C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 48F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 19C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine in the morning with more clouds for later in the day. High near 65F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Low 11C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Low near 50F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy in the morning then periods of showers later in the day. High near 15C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with some showers in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low near 10C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 49F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 14C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 56F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of rain after midnight. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and rain later during the night. Low 46F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 6C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 42F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 12C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 52F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 4C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear skies. Low 39F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 12C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 51F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 6C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 42F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 53F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 7C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 43F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.
